biotools.summary: phenopype is a high throughput phenotyping pipeline for Python to support ecologists and evolutionary biologists in extracting high dimensional phenotypic data from digital images. phenopype integrates state-of-the-art computer vision functions (using opencv-python as the main backbone), the possibility for GUI-based interactions and a project management ecosystem to facilitate rapid data collection and reproducibility.
